rewrite1: For the tenth paragraph, adjust the line spacing to 1.5 lines. Set the spacing to have a 1.5 cm gap following the paragraph and a 0.5 line space before it. Change the font to Calibri Light, and designate the outline level as 'Body Text'. Lastly, apply an Indigo color to the font.
